name: add_missing_from
category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
short_desc: Automatically adds missing table references to FROM clauses.

name: archive_command
short_desc: WAL archiving command.
extra_desc: The shell command that will be called to archive a WAL file.

name: australian_timezones
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Interprets ACST, CST, EST, and SAT as Australian time zones.
extra_desc: Otherwise they are interpreted as North/South American time zones and Saturday.

name: authentication_timeout
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Sets the maximum time in seconds to complete client authentication.

name: autovacuum
short_desc: Starts the auto vacuum subprocess.

name: autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor
short_desc: Number of tuple inserts, updates or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

name: autovacuum_analyze_threshold
short_desc: Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates or deletes prior to analyze.

name: autovacuum_naptime
short_desc: Time to sleep between autovacuum runs, in seconds.

name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay
short_desc: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds, for autovacuum.

name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit
short_desc: Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

name: autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor
short_desc: Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

name: autovacuum_vacuum_threshold
short_desc: Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

name: bgwriter_all_maxpages
short_desc: Background writer maximum number of all pages to flush per round

name: bgwriter_all_percent
short_desc: Background writer percentage of all buffers to flush per round

name: bgwriter_delay
short_desc: Background writer sleep time between rounds in milliseconds

name: bgwriter_lru_maxpages
short_desc: Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round

name: bgwriter_lru_percent
short_desc: Background writer percentage of LRU buffers to flush per round

name: block_size
short_desc: Shows size of a disk block

name: bonjour_name
short_desc: Sets the Bonjour broadcast service name.

name: check_function_bodies
short_desc: Check function bodies during CREATE FUNCTION.

name: checkpoint_segments
short_desc: Sets the maximum distance in log segments between automatic WAL checkpoints.

name: checkpoint_timeout
short_desc: Sets the maximum time in seconds between automatic WAL checkpoints.

name: checkpoint_warning
short_desc: Logs if filling of checkpoint segments happens more frequently than this (in seconds).
extra_desc: Write a message to the server log if checkpoints caused by the filling of checkpoint segment files happens more frequently than this number of seconds. Zero turns off the warning.

name: client_encoding
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the client's character set encoding.

name: client_min_messages
category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
short_desc: Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.
extra_desc: Valid values are DEBUG5, DEBUG4, DEBUG3, DEBUG2, DEBUG1, LOG, NOTICE, WARNING, and ERROR. Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.

name: commit_delay
short_desc: Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

name: commit_siblings
short_desc: Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

name: config_file
short_desc: Sets the server's main configuration file.

name: constraint_exclusion
short_desc: Enables the planner to use constraints to limit table access.
extra_desc: This prevents table access if the table constraints guarantee that table access is necessary.

name: cpu_index_tuple_cost
short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of processing cost for each index tuple (row) during index scan.
extra_desc: This is measured as a fraction of the cost of a sequential page fetch.

name: cpu_operator_cost
short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of processing cost of each operator in WHERE.
extra_desc: This is measured as a fraction of the cost of a sequential page fetch.

name: cpu_tuple_cost
short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).
extra_desc: This is measured as a fraction of the cost of a sequential page fetch.

name: custom_variable_classes
short_desc: Sets the list of known custom variable classes.

name: data_directory
short_desc: Sets the server's data directory.

name: DateStyle
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the display format for date and time values.
extra_desc: Also controls interpretation of ambiguous date inputs.

name: db_user_namespace
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Enables per-database user names.

name: deadlock_timeout
short_desc: The time in milliseconds to wait on lock before checking for deadlock.

name: debug_pretty_print
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Indents parse and plan tree displays.

name: debug_print_parse
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Prints the parse tree to the server log.

name: debug_print_plan
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Prints the execution plan to server log.

name: debug_print_rewritten
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Prints the parse tree after rewriting to server log.

name: default_statistics_target
short_desc: Sets the default statistics target.
extra_desc: This applies to table columns that have not had a column-specific target set via ALTER TABLE SET STATISTICS.

name: default_tablespace
short_desc: Sets the default tablespace to create tables and indexes in.
extra_desc: An empty string selects the database's default tablespace.

name: default_transaction_isolation
short_desc: Sets the transaction isolation level of each new transaction.
extra_desc: Each SQL transaction has an isolation level, which can be either "read uncommitted", "read committed", "repeatable read", or "serializable".

name: default_transaction_read_only
short_desc: Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.

name: default_with_oids
category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
short_desc: Create new tables with OIDs by default.

name: dynamic_library_path
short_desc: Sets the path for dynamically loadable modules.
extra_desc: If a dynamically loadable module needs to be opened and the specified name does not have a directory component (i.e., the name does not contain a slash), the system will search this path for the specified file.

name: effective_cache_size
short_desc: Sets the planner's assumption about size of the disk cache.
extra_desc: That is, the portion of the kernel's disk cache that will be used for PostgreSQL data files. This is measured in disk pages, which are normally 8 kB each.

name: enable_bitmapscan
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.

name: enable_hashagg
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of hashed aggregation plans.

name: enable_hashjoin
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of hash join plans.

name: enable_indexscan
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of index-scan plans.

name: enable_mergejoin
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.

name: enable_nestloop
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.

name: enable_seqscan
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.

name: enable_sort
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.

name: enable_tidscan
short_desc: Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.

name: escape_string_warning
category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
short_desc: Warn about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.

name: explain_pretty_print
short_desc: Uses the indented output format for EXPLAIN VERBOSE.

name: external_pid_file
short_desc: Writes the postmaster PID to the specified file.

name: extra_float_digits
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the number of digits displayed for floating-point values.
extra_desc: This affects real, double precision, and geometric data types. The parameter value is added to the standard number of digits (FLT_DIG or DBL_DIG as appropriate).

name: from_collapse_limit
short_desc: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed.
extra_desc: The planner will merge subqueries into upper queries if the resulting FROM list would have no more than this many items.

name: fsync
short_desc: Forces synchronization of updates to disk.
extra_desc: The server will use the fsync() system call in several places to make sure that updates are physically written to disk. This insures that a database cluster will recover to a consistent state after an operating system or hardware crash.

name: full_page_writes
short_desc: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.
extra_desc: A page write in process during an operating system crash might be only partially written to disk.  During recovery, the row changesstored in WAL are not enough to recover.  This option writes pages when first modified after a checkpoint to WAL so full recovery is possible.

name: geqo
short_desc: Enables genetic query optimization.
extra_desc: This algorithm attempts to do planning without exhaustive searching.

name: geqo_effort
short_desc: GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters.

name: geqo_generations
short_desc: GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm.
extra_desc: Zero selects a suitable default value.

name: geqo_pool_size
short_desc: GEQO: number of individuals in the population.
extra_desc: Zero selects a suitable default value.

name: geqo_selection_bias
short_desc: GEQO: selective pressure within the population.

name: geqo_threshold
short_desc: Sets the threshold of FROM items beyond which GEQO is used.

name: hba_file
short_desc: Sets the server's "hba" configuration file

name: ident_file
short_desc: Sets the server's "ident" configuration file

name: integer_datetimes
short_desc: Datetimes are integer based

name: join_collapse_limit
short_desc: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which JOIN constructs are not flattened.
extra_desc: The planner will flatten explicit inner JOIN constructs into lists of FROM items whenever a list of no more than this many items would result.

name: krb_caseins_users
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Sets whether Kerberos user names should be treated case insensitive.

name: krb_server_hostname
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Sets the hostname of the Kerberos server.

name: krb_server_keyfile
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Sets the location of the Kerberos server key file.

name: krb_srvname
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Sets the name of the Kerberos service.

name: lc_collate
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Shows the collation order locale.

name: lc_ctype
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Shows the character classification and case conversion locale.

name: lc_messages
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the language in which messages are displayed.

name: lc_monetary
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the locale for formatting monetary amounts.

name: lc_numeric
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the locale for formatting numbers.

name: lc_time
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the locale for formatting date and time values.

name: listen_addresses
short_desc: Sets the host name or IP address(es) to listen to.

name: log_connections
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Logs each successful connection.

name: log_destination
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Sets the destination for server log output.
extra_desc: Valid values are combinations of "stderr", "syslog", and "eventlog", depending on the platform.

name: log_directory
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Sets the destination directory for log files.
extra_desc: May be specified as relative to the data directory or as absolute path.

name: log_disconnections
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Logs end of a session, including duration.

name: log_duration
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.

name: log_error_verbosity
category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
short_desc: Sets the verbosity of logged messages.
extra_desc: Valid values are "terse", "default", and "verbose".

name: log_executor_stats
short_desc: Writes executor performance statistics to the server log.

name: log_filename
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Sets the file name pattern for log files.

name: log_hostname
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Logs the host name in the connection logs.
extra_desc: By default, connection logs only show the IP address of the connecting host. If you want them to show the host name you can turn this on, but depending on your host name resolution setup it might impose a non-negligible performance penalty.

name: log_line_prefix
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Controls information prefixed to each log line
extra_desc: if blank no prefix is used

name: log_min_duration_statement
category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
short_desc: Sets the minimum execution time in milliseconds above which statements will be logged.
extra_desc: Zero prints all queries. The default is -1 (turning this feature off).

name: log_min_error_statement
category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
short_desc: Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.
extra_desc: All SQL statements that cause an error of the specified level or a higher level are logged.

name: log_min_messages
category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
short_desc: Sets the message levels that are logged.
extra_desc: Valid values are DEBUG5, DEBUG4, DEBUG3, DEBUG2, DEBUG1, INFO, NOTICE, WARNING, ERROR, LOG, FATAL, and PANIC. Each level includes all the levels that follow it.

name: log_parser_stats
short_desc: Writes parser performance statistics to the server log.

name: log_planner_stats
short_desc: Writes planner performance statistics to the server log.

name: log_rotation_age
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N minutes

name: log_rotation_size
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N kilobytes

name: log_statement
category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
short_desc: Sets the type of statements logged.
extra_desc: Valid values are "none", "ddl", "mod", and "all".

name: log_statement_stats
short_desc: Writes cumulative performance statistics to the server log.

name: log_truncate_on_rotation
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Truncate existing log files of same name during log rotation.

name: maintenance_work_mem
short_desc: Sets the maximum memory to be used for maintenance operations.
extra_desc: This includes operations such as VACUUM and CREATE INDEX.

name: max_connections
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

name: max_files_per_process
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously open files for each server process.

name: max_fsm_pages
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of disk pages for which free space is tracked.

name: max_fsm_relations
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of tables and indexes for which free space is tracked.

name: max_function_args
short_desc: Shows the maximum number of function arguments.

name: max_identifier_length
short_desc: Shows the maximum identifier length

name: max_index_keys
short_desc: Shows the maximum number of index keys.

name: max_locks_per_transaction
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.
extra_desc: The shared lock table is sized on the assumption that at most max_locks_per_transaction * max_connections distinct objects will need to be locked at any one time.

name: max_prepared_transactions
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.

name: max_stack_depth
short_desc: Sets the maximum stack depth, in kilobytes.

name: password_encryption
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Encrypt passwords.
extra_desc: When a password is specified in CREATE USER or ALTER USER without writing either ENCRYPTED or UNENCRYPTED, this parameter determines whether the password is to be encrypted.

name: port
short_desc: Sets the TCP port the server listens on.

name: pre_auth_delay
short_desc: no description available

name: preload_libraries
short_desc: Lists shared libraries to preload into server.

name: random_page_cost
short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page.
extra_desc: This is measured as a multiple of the cost of a sequential page fetch. A higher value makes it more likely a sequential scan will be used, a lower value makes it more likely an index scan will be used.

name: redirect_stderr
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Start a subprocess to capture stderr output into log files.

name: regex_flavor
category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
short_desc: Sets the regular expression "flavor".
extra_desc: This can be set to advanced, extended, or basic.

name: search_path
short_desc: Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.

name: server_encoding
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the server (database) character set encoding.

name: server_version
short_desc: Shows the server version.

name: shared_buffers
short_desc: Sets the number of shared memory buffers used by the server.

name: silent_mode
category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
short_desc: Runs the server silently.
extra_desc: If this parameter is set, the server will automatically run in the background and any controlling terminals are dissociated.

name: sql_inheritance
category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
short_desc: Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.

name: ssl
category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
short_desc: Enables SSL connections.

name: standard_conforming_strings
short_desc: '...' strings treat backslashes literally.

name: statement_timeout
short_desc: Sets the maximum allowed duration (in milliseconds) of any statement.
extra_desc: A value of 0 turns off the timeout.

name: stats_block_level
category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
short_desc: Collects block-level statistics on database activity.

name: stats_command_string
category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
short_desc: Collects statistics about executing commands.
extra_desc: Enables the collection of statistics on the currently executing command of each session, along with the time at which that command began execution.

name: stats_reset_on_server_start
category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
short_desc: Zeroes collected statistics on server restart.

name: stats_row_level
category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
short_desc: Collects row-level statistics on database activity.

name: stats_start_collector
category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
short_desc: Starts the server statistics-collection subprocess.

name: superuser_reserved_connections
short_desc: Sets the number of connection slots reserved for superusers.

name: syslog_facility
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Sets the syslog "facility" to be used when syslog enabled.
extra_desc: Valid values are LOCAL0, LOCAL1, LOCAL2, LOCAL3, LOCAL4, LOCAL5, LOCAL6, LOCAL7.

name: syslog_ident
category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
short_desc: Sets the program name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in syslog.

name: tcp_keepalives_count
short_desc: Maximum number of TCP keepalive retransmits.
extra_desc: This controls the number of consecutive keepalive retransmits that can be lost before a connection is considered dead. A value of 0 uses the system default.

name: tcp_keepalives_idle
short_desc: Seconds between issuing TCP keepalives.
extra_desc: A value of 0 uses the system default.

name: tcp_keepalives_interval
short_desc: Seconds between TCP keepalive retransmits.
extra_desc: A value of 0 uses the system default.

name: temp_buffers
short_desc: Sets the maximum number of temporary buffers used by each session.

name: TimeZone
category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
short_desc: Sets the time zone for displaying and interpreting time stamps.

name: trace_notify
short_desc: Generates debugging output for LISTEN and NOTIFY.

name: transaction_isolation
short_desc: Sets the current transaction's isolation level.

name: transaction_read_only
short_desc: Sets the current transaction's read-only status.

name: transform_null_equals
category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Other Platforms and Clients
short_desc: Treats "expr=NULL" as "expr IS NULL".
extra_desc: When turned on, expressions of the form expr = NULL (or NULL = expr) are treated as expr IS NULL, that is, they return true if expr evaluates to the null value, and false otherwise. The correct behavior of expr = NULL is to always return null (unknown).

name: unix_socket_directory
short_desc: Sets the directory where the Unix-domain socket will be created.

name: unix_socket_group
short_desc: Sets the owning group of the Unix-domain socket.
extra_desc: (The owning user of the socket is always the user that starts the server.)

name: unix_socket_permissions
short_desc: Sets the access permissions of the Unix-domain socket.
extra_desc: Unix-domain sockets use the usual Unix file system permission set. The parameter value is expected to be an numeric mode specification in the form accepted by the chmod and umask system calls. (To use the customary octal format the number must start with a 0 (zero).)

name: vacuum_cost_delay
short_desc: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds.

name: vacuum_cost_limit
short_desc: Vacuum cost amount available before napping.

name: vacuum_cost_page_dirty
short_desc: Vacuum cost for a page dirtied by vacuum.

name: vacuum_cost_page_hit
short_desc: Vacuum cost for a page found in the buffer cache.

name: vacuum_cost_page_miss
short_desc: Vacuum cost for a page not found in the buffer cache.

name: wal_buffers
short_desc: Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL.

name: wal_sync_method
short_desc: Selects the method used for forcing WAL updates out to disk.

name: work_mem
short_desc: Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces.
extra_desc: This much memory may be used by each internal sort operation and hash table before switching to temporary disk files.

name: zero_damaged_pages
short_desc: Continues processing past damaged page headers.
extra_desc: Detection of a damaged page header normally causes PostgreSQL to report an error, aborting the current transaction. Setting zero_damaged_pages to true causes the system to instead report a warning, zero out the damaged page, and continue processing. This behavior will destroy data, namely all the rows on the damaged page.
